channel.title: Gtk on Le murmure de Julian
channel.description: Recent content in Gtk on Le murmure de Julian

item.title: [筆記] Install Python Gtk binding and Qt binding on SnowLeopard
item.description: 其實也不用拿source自己編, 用MacPort就可了, 很簡單: install PyQt4: sudo port install py26-pyqt4 install Py-gtk sudo port install py26-gtk
